PERSONA:
james is a 55-year-old divorced white man living in a metropolitan area in the west south central region of the united states. he was born and raised in the country and has been a citizen all his life. james has some college education but did not complete a degree.

despite being raised in a religious household, james now identifies as having no particular religion and considers himself unaffiliated. he attends religious services only a few times a year. politically, james aligns himself with the democratic party and holds moderate to conservative views.

james comes from a middle-income background, earning between $30,000 and $40,000 annually. he is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously. james is an active member of his community and engages in volunteerism.

in his personal life, james enjoys staying connected and uses the internet several times a day. he values education and hopes to one day complete his college degree. james is open-minded and enjoys learning about different cultures and perspectives.
